author: Paul Ziobro
title: Packages Weigh on U.S. Postal Service as Losses Grow
text:
The U.S. Postal Service delivered higher revenue but a wider loss from its package delivery business, a segment that President Donald Trump has criticized as hurting the agency through contracts with shippers like Amazon.com. â€‹
Higher costs tied to processing packages weighed on the Postal Service in its latest quarter, even as it relied on that same business to increase revenue amid a continuing decline in first-class mail.
